FeaturedItem.Title: Contemporary workplace
FeaturedItem.Copy: True entrepreneurs work everywhere, in the usual – and unconventional – locations. Meetings are held in boardrooms, paperwork is tackled at coffee shops, and brainstorming is done during a layover at the airport.

FeaturedItem.Title: Fancy: Artful Royalty-Free photography
FeaturedItem.Copy: Capturing contemporary lifestyles and modern preoccupations, Fancy sets new standards for Royalty-Free photography. Attention to lighting, location, and models give this collection style and substance.
